Package com.madhura.fileHandling.ness.contoller

Class FileByDatabaseController

java.lang.Object
com.madhura.fileHandling.ness.contoller.FileByDatabaseController
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/DBfile")
public class FileByDatabaseController
extends java.lang.Object
This is the Api database controller class used to upload/download single file.
Author:
Madhura
See Also:
http://localhost/9761/DBfile

  • Method Details

    • SingleFileUpload

      @PostMapping("/single/uploadDb") public FileResponse SingleFileUpload​(@RequestParam("file") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file) throws java.io.IOException
      This is method used to store single file in database.

      This method store FileDocument entity in Database. where FileDocument contains SIngleFile column

      Parameters:
      file - please provide key is file and select here your file need to upload
      Returns:
      FileResponse class where you can find uploaded file details
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if file not selected properly, not select any file
      See Also:
      http://localhost/9761/DBfile//single/uploadDb

    • downloadSingleFile

      @GetMapping("/downloadDb/{fileName}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<byte[]> downloadSingleFile​(@PathVariable java.lang.String fileName, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      This method used to get single file from the database.

      If provide fileName you can get File

      Parameters:
      fileName - please provide your filename along with url like http://localhost:9761//DBfile//downloadDb/?fileName=real nav.html
      request - it is HttpServletRequest contains all request information. Here used to get MediaType.
      Returns:
      status code, your file downloaded
      See Also:
      http://localhost/9761/DBfile//single//downloadDb/{fileName}
